title: Live Support
content:
Service Management's Service Request Management module includes Live Support for dealing with telephone support calls. With the appropriate configuration and an integrated CTI system, Live Support provides you with key information and tools that can help to efficiently process new requests and inquiries received by telephone. For example, if your system is appropriately configured, when you receive a call from a user, Service Management can automatically identify the caller's details and recent requests. For more information about Live Support, see How to configure Live Support with CTI.

Related topics

  • How to deal with a Live Support call
